column6:
"Dead Wrong",2009,1
The conclusion of Terry Moore's (Strangers in Paradise) first heart-wrenching story-arc. It's the final showdown between Karolina's fellow Majesdanians and the Runaways. The effects of this will shake the core of the Runaways and change their lives. And with Humberto Ramos (X-MEN, WOLVERINE) on board you KNOW you can't miss this. Part 6 (of 6)
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | other:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Dave Meikis | writer:Terry Moore | penciller:Humberto Ramos | colorist:Christina Strain
